resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107151</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107151</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085814</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Open-Of-Course</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Öffnen-Von-Kurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ouvrir-De-Cours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abr-$$$-Curso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Apr-De-Corso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοικτός-$$$-ΣΕΙΡΑ μαθημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Abrir-De-Curso</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Multilingual portal for free and open content courses and tutorials that people can benefit of in daily life. Educators can also add their own educational content to the system. The content at the moment consists mainly of language and computer related material. (not all content is multilingual)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>ar</language>
          <language>bg</language>
          <language>zh</language>
          <language>cs</language>
          <language>da</language>
          <language>nl</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>fr</language>
          <language>de</language>
          <language>hi</language>
          <language>it</language>
          <language>no</language>
          <language>pt</language>
          <language>ru</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mehrsprachiges Portal für die freien und 
geöffneten zufriedenen Kurse und die Tutorials, die Leute in von der 
täglichen Lebensdauer fördern können. Erzieher können ihren 
eigenen pädagogischen Inhalt dem System auch hinzufügen. Der 
Inhalt besteht im Augenblick hauptsächlich aus Sprache und Computer 
in Verbindung gestandenem Material (nicht aller Inhalt ist 
mehrsprachig)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Portail multilingue pour les cours et les cours 
d'instruction contents libres et ouverts que les gens peuvent 
bénéficier de dans la vie quotidienne. Les éducateurs peuvent
également ajouter leur propre contenu éducatif au système. Le
contenu consiste à l'heure actuelle principalement en langage et 
matériel associé par ordinateur (non tout le contenu est 
multilingue)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Portal multilingual para os cursos e os tutorials 
satisfeitos livres e abertos que os povos podem beneficiar na vida 
diária. Os educadores podem também adicionar seu próprio 
índice educacional ao sistema. O índice consiste neste momento
principalmente na língua e no material relacionado computador (não 
todo o índice é multilingual)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Portal multilingue per i corsi e le lezioni 
private soddisfatti liberi ed aperti che la gente può avvantaggiare 
in vita quotidiana. Gli educatori possono anche aggiungere il 
loro proprio soddisfare educativo al sistema. Il soddisfare al 
momento è fatto di pricipalmente il linguaggio ed il materiale 
riferito calcolatore (non tutto il soddisfare è multilingue)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολύγλωσση πύλη για τις ελεύθερα και ανοικτά 
ικανοποιημένα σειρές μαθημάτων και τα σεμινάρια των οποίων οι 
άνθρωποι μπορούν να ωφεληθούν στην καθημερινή ζωή. Οι 
εκπαιδευτικοί μπορούν επίσης να προσθέσουν το εκπαιδευτικό 
περιεχόμενό τους στο σύστημα. Το περιεχόμενο αποτελείται 
προς το παρόν κυρίως από τη γλώσσα και σχετικό με το τον 
υπολογιστή υλικό (δεν είναι όλο το περιεχόμενο πολύγλωσσο)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Portal multilingüe para los cursos y las guías 
contentos libres y abiertos que la gente puede beneficiar en de vida 
de cada día. Los educadores pueden también agregar su propio 
contenido educativo al sistema. El contenido en el momento 
consiste principalmente en lenguaje y el material relacionado 
ordenador (no todo el contenido es multilingüe)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Negocio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>

N:C. BETHLEHEM

        </lifeCycle>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>ar</language>
          <contribute>

        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

    </metadata>
  </description>
